summary: This document is an internal FBI email chain from December 2020, discussing outreach from a victim of Jeffrey Epstein. It references a victim who was recruited at age 16 in West Palm Beach and her subsequent difficulties, as well as logistical issues and attempts to contact law enforcement from August 2019.

events.title: FBI email regarding Epstein victim
events.description: An FBI email discusses a long conversation with a victim of Jeffrey Epstein who was recruited at age 16 in West Palm Beach and is seeking resources.

events.title: Victim calls regarding NY meeting and flight change
events.description: A victim called the FBI about a meeting in New York and requested assistance changing a flight from Palm Beach to Fort Lauderdale, indicating difficulty communicating with her contact.

keyFacts: A victim of Jeffrey Epstein contacted the FBI, stating she was recruited/brought into the situation at age 16 in West Palm Beach.
The victim reported that her life 'hasn't been the same since' the abuse.
The document references a victim attempting to travel to New York for a meeting in August 2019 and having logistical issues with flights.
The email chain shows FBI internal coordination to connect a victim with victim services (VS).
